name: Mira Nila Classic
description:
The Mira Nila Classic is a single speed street bike built up with high quality components for low-maintenance durability and a clean design. Meant for the distinguished rider, this Bambike is striking, nimble, and is sure to have you cycling around your neighborhood and to arrive at your destination in style.


Technical Specifications 

Frame: Bambike single speed made of bamboo. The lugs (or joints) of the Bambike are made of abaca fiber and resin. The component interfaces, or connection points, are made out of aircraft-grade aluminum.

Fork: Bambike Custom aluminum alloy with brushed aluminum finish   

Hubs: Bambike "flip-flop" fixed & free, alloy, sealed bearing, hollow axel, with dust cover, 32 hole, laser Bambike logo   

Cogs: 16T freewheel & 16T fixed gear w/ lock-ring

Crank: Bambike 165mm 46T alloy crankset, laser Bambike logo 

Tires: Ene Ciclo 28mm brown and creme walls

Rims: 30mm double-wall alloy

Handlebar: Alloy dropbar with hand-stitched leather grips

Saddle: Brown leather sport saddle w/ tension wrench 

Pedals: Wellgo Achilles with stainless steel toeclips and stitched leather straps 


CERTIFIED to EN 14781 by Intertek Testing Services

5 year limited warranty

email info@bambike.com for more information

name: Single Speed Bamboo Frame
description:
This bamboo bike frame is the body of the Mira Nila Classic Bambike.
It is quick, agile, and responsive - perfect for your daily commute or weekend joyride. 
 
Bamboo used to build a Bambike frame is harvested in the dry season and treated with natural processes: air-dried, smoked and heat-treated. The lugs are hand-wrapped abaca (aka Manila hemp) fiber with epoxy resin. Headtube, bottom bracket shell, seat tube insert, and dropouts are made from aircraft-grade aluminum.

TECHNICAL SPECIFICATIONS
Headtube             1 1/8"
Bottom Bracket    68mm ISO/English/BSA 
Seat Tube            27.2mm
Dropouts             Horizontal w/ bolt on seat stay (belt drive ready) 

See frame geometry at http://bambike.com/miranila

CERTIFIED to EN 14781 by Intertek Testing Services.

5 year Warranty

name: Commuter Helmet
description: This lid is designed to offer you the protection you need with the style you want. Handmade from synthetic leather.

name: Luntian All-Terrain Bamboo Bike
description:
The LUNTIAN is our most versatile model. This bamboo bike is ready for anything: game to tackle the mean streets of the urban jungle and well equipped to hit the off-road trails!  A more relaxed rider position makes for a very comfortable ride.  The Luntian can be built up like a mountain bike, ready to accommodate a suspension fork, up to 30 gears, hydraulic disc brakes, and a cargo rack.  It can also be built up as a more commuter oriented Bambike. This Bambike design is very durable and adaptable, capable of handling anything that you can throw at it.

“LUNTIAN” is the Filipino term for the color green, used to refer to the greenness of something grand or incalculable such as landscapes or foliage.

name: All-Terrain Bamboo Frame
description:
This bamboo bike frame is the body of the Luntian Bambike.
It is sturdy and capable - perfect for the urban jungle or off-road trail. 

Bamboo used to build a Bambike frame is harvested in the dry season and treated with natural processes: air-dried, smoked and heat-treated. The lugs are hand-wrapped abaca (aka Manila hemp) fiber with epoxy resin. Headtube, bottom bracket shell, seat tube insert, and dropouts are made from aircraft-grade aluminum.

TECHNICAL SPECIFICATIONS
Headtube 1 1/8"
Bottom Bracket 68mm ISO/English/BSA 
Seat Tube 27.2mm
Dropouts Vertical w/ derailleur and bolt on seat stay (belt drive ready)

See frame geometry at http://bambike.com/luntian

CERTIFIED to EN 14766 by Intertek Testing Services

5 year Warranty
